guiSET.core

Class Knob

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.Slider
        • guiSET.core.Knob

  • public class Knob
extends Slider
    A value knob similar to the slider. The value can be set by clicking on a part of the outer arc or by dragging the knob either horizontally or vertically, depending on the orientation that has been set (default is horizontal). The dragging direction behavior can be reversed by setting dragSpeed to negative values.
    Author:
    E-Bow
